name: 2-ethanediol (CAS Reg. No. 1038843-64-9) and optionally prepared with trimellitic anhydride
FoodContactSubstance: Terephthalic acid polymer with 1,4:3,6-dianhydro-D-glucitol, 1,4-cyclohexanedimethanol and 1,2-ethanediol (CAS Reg. No. 1038843-64-9) and optionally prepared with trimellitic anhydride (CAS Reg. No. 552-30-7) as a branching agent. REPLACES FCNs 1075, 1444 and 1556
